name: Colour is Art Exhibition
description: Get immersed in representational art and compositions reminiscing childhood surroundings and dreams in a visual language of shapes, forms and colour. Presented in an inspiring solo show by Victor de M.

name: Jr. Forest Explorers: Tiny Explorers
description:
Join us for a caregiver and toddler nature program. Connect with the natural world through hands-on outdoor activities.

Tiny Explorers - Summer has begun! Join us for a mini hike in Downsview Park and participate in a summer scavenger hunt. Let's discover all the tiny treasures in our urban park!

French language service is available upon request. Please let us know.

name: MY HOUSE Junction Jazz Fest
description:
Toronto's MY HOUSE in the Junction is a live music venue and restaurant teaming up with Brooklyn, New York-based Browntasauras Records to bring you some of the best jazz in the country!

For the inaugural festival this year, we're featuring Artist-In-Residence Brownman Ali as the Artistic Director.  This ten-times Global Music Award winner, twelve-times JUNO Award nominee and GRAMMY long-lister will be on stage every night during the festival as either a sideman or a leader, and has hand-picked all the top-shelf musicians involved. Come for an unforgettable jazz experience!
